text:
Hello, i use TWiki site on Apache. Since i moved to 2.0.47, i can't login to 
system. My passwords stored by SHA encoding in .htpasswd file.
All other encodings works fine, but SHA encoded password causes "Password 
Missmatch" in log.

I moved back to 1.3.28...

Thanks!
creator: aefimov@spklabs.com
jorton@redhat.com
